publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4215 Jackie Baillie: Helensburgh and Lomond Real Ale Festivalâ€”That the Parliament applauds the Helensburgh and District Round Table for organising the Helensburgh and Lomond Real Ale Festival, which takes place on Friday 22 and Saturday 23 May 2009; notes that the festival will showcase 27 of the finest Scottish real ales and entertainment will be provided by local musicians; particularly congratulates the Helensburgh and District Round Table for donating all the proceeds from the festival to Parklands School to improve its playground facilities; notes that Parklands School meets the needs of pupils from five to 19 with moderate, severe and profound learning difficulties; thanks all those involved in organising the festival and contributing to such a worthwhile cause, and encourages people from all over Scotland to attend.

S3M-4215 Helensburgh and Lomond Real Ale Festival (lodged on 21 May 2009) Jam ie McGrigor*, Stewart Maxwell*, Jam es Kelly*, Robin Harper*, John Lam ont*, Helen Eadie*, Mary Mulligan*, Patrick Harvie*, Patricia Ferguson*, Karen Whitefield*, John Park*, Bob Doris*
S3M-4215 Helensburgh and Lomond Real Ale Festival (lodged on 21 May 2009) Ross Finnie*, Gil Paterson*, Bill Kidd*, Trish Godman*
S3M-4215 Helensburgh and Lomond Real Ale Festival (lodged on 21 May 2009) Stuart McMillan*
S3M-4215 Helensburgh and Lomond Real Ale Festival (lodged on 21 May 2009) Marilyn Livingstone*
